p: P. nigra buds were collected in Szczodre (2013 and 2014), Wrocław (2015) (Lower Silesia, Poland) and Kórnik Arboretum of Institute of Dendrology of the Polish Academy of Sciences (2015) and bought from commercial sources. P. tremula buds were collected in Szczodre (2013, 2015 and 2016) and Arboretum Wojsławice, branch of Wrocław University Botanical Garden (2017). All of the samples were dried for three weeks prior to analysis.
